ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.9'

about.description:
matscholar (Materials Scholar) is a Python library for materials-
focused natural language processing (NLP). It is maintained by a team
of researchers at UC Berkeley and Lawrence Berkeley National
Laboratory as part of a project funded by the Toyota Research
Institute.
about.summary: Code to access the Matscholar public API.

about.description:
matscholar (Materials Scholar) is a Python library for materials-
focused natural language processing (NLP). It is maintained by a team
of researchers at UC Berkeley and Lawrence Berkeley National
Laboratory as part of a project funded by the Toyota Research
Institute.
about.summary: Code to access the Matscholar public API.

name: matscholar
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "matscholar" %}
{% set version = "0.0.3" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/materialsintelligence/{{ name }}/archive/master.tar.gz
  sha256: 41e97b44f254b29664dcdbef07e9758ab4185a34c0c630ca5aad67c65b290991

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 1
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - numpy
    - requests
    - pyyaml

test:
  imports:
    - matscholar
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}

about:
  home: https://matscholar.com/
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'Code to access the Matscholar public API.'
  description: |
    matscholar (Materials Scholar) is a Python library for materials-
    focused natural language processing (NLP). It is maintained by a team 
    of researchers at UC Berkeley and Lawrence Berkeley National 
    Laboratory as part of a project funded by the Toyota Research 
    Institute.
  doc_url: https://github.com/materialsintelligence/matscholar
  dev_url: https://github.com/materialsintelligence/matscholar

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jan-janssen
